about_the_game:
Death Match Mod
Pick up the weapons and kill all the 8 players and zombies. Choose the weapons that perfectuate your play style and strategy.
In the play time, you will respawn if you are killed. Go for REVENGE!!!
Get Heal-packs and armors for recovery and defense capability to stay alive.
“Kill everyone you see while you make the escape”

[/b]Challenge Mod[/b]
Defeat all zombies and other players
You will encounter with various zombies and weapons. Shoot'em all !!!
Be the one of top 8 players in the world !!
"Be the best or lose all"

“Players are not the only ones that are after you.” Out-Break in the prison turned the guards and the prisoners into ZOMBIES. You must save yourself from various zombies coming for you.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Death Match Mod
Pick up the weapons and kill all the 8 players and zombies. Choose the weapons that perfectuate your play style and strategy.
In the play time, you will respawn if you are killed. Go for REVENGE!!!
Get Heal-packs and armors for recovery and defense capability to stay alive.
“Kill everyone you see while you make the escape”

[/b]Challenge Mod[/b]
Defeat all zombies and other players
You will encounter with various zombies and weapons. Shoot'em all !!!
Be the one of top 8 players in the world !!
"Be the best or lose all"

“Players are not the only ones that are after you.” Out-Break in the prison turned the guards and the prisoners into ZOMBIES. You must save yourself from various zombies coming for you.
name: ESCAPE POINT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: “Players are not the only ones that are after you.” Out-Break in the prison turned the guards and the prisoners into ZOMBIES. You must save yourself from various zombies coming for you.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
